events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has identified the issue as a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the product fit.
Your case has been assigned to our refunds specialist team to assist you further with the process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your refund request. I'm here to help get this resolved for you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product has been returned to us already?
The order number is 987654321, and I haven't returned the jacket yet because I was unsure of the return process.
Thank you for the info! You can return the jacket using the prepaid label we will email you shortly. Once we receive it, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick reply and clear instructions. I will send it back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should appear in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Thank you for contacting support. We are closing this case now, but feel free to reach out if you have any more questions or issues.
